titleStmt.title: The happiness of a people in the wisdome of their rulers directing and in the obedience of their brethren attending unto what Israel ougho [sic] to do recommended in a sermon before the Honourable Governour and Council, and the respected Deputies of Mattachusets [sic] colony in New-England. : Preached at Boston, May 3d, 1676, being the day of election there. / By William Hubbard ...
titleStmt.author: Hubbard, William, 1621 or 2-1704.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of originals in Yale University Library and John Carter Brown Library and Dr. Williams' Library (London, England).
Item at 2591:6b is bound following: A narrative of the troubles with the Indians / by W. Hubbard ... Boston : Printed by John Foster, in the year 1677.
